name: Blood Not Allowed
description:
Welcome to the Manor, the only inhabited place in those dark lands. You will find here many festivities, as well as exposition rooms. We hope you'll enjoy your stay. Beware though, this place is haunted exclusively by skeletons. Many skeletons. Perhaps too many. And jazz.

Blood Not Allowed, or Don't Play This Game If You're Afraid Of Skeletons, is a comedy-horror musical game relying on exploration and narration. There are no challenges or goals, you can wander freely in the game's world and discover its secrets. It also offers a dynamic soundtrack, so make sure your speakers or headphones are on.

Thanks to Calliope Rannis for proofreading.

Made with Twine and the Web Audio API.

Music composed with Linux Multi Media Studio. Soundfonts from FlameStudios, Soni Musicae, FreeDrumKits.net,  HQ Orchestral Soundfont Collection, Sonatina Symphonic Orchestra, and Musical Artefacts. Some samples are from freeSFX.co.uk and Freesound.org.

If you're curious, you can read the devlog.
